page.title: 02Riste Farm Long Whatton
page.content: Riste Farm,Long Whatton is at Grid Reference 458227.It is 200 acres of farmland and 10 acres of deciduous woodland.Mr.Clowes,the farmer,has farmed the land for 23 years.His father farmed it for 44years before him.He said that the farm was over 200 years old. Of the 200 acres he has 50 acres of grassland on which he has cows and followers which he sells for beef at Melton Mowbray cattle market.The rest of the land is arable.The crops he grows are Oilseed Rape<20 acres>Oats<21acres>Barley<77 acres>Wheat<32 acres>He sells these crops to a merchant at NEWARKE in Nottinghamshire. He has his son and daughter working with him.They have 7 cats and 2 dogs.They do most of the work themselves not using contractors.
